												Fun arena-based local multiplayer shooting car game (ABLMSCG wut). Can get pretty chaotic with 4 players but that just adds to the fun as the game is rather fast-paced anyway. Weapons seem balanced enough, oil and flame weapons are really kewl.Works well with controllers so console port when
